title: Viktor Maryenko
text: Viktor Semyonovich Maryenko (; born 25 August 1929 in <a href="Yasynuvata">Yasynuvata</a>; died 9 July 2007 in <a href="Petrovskoye%2C%20Yaroslavl%20Oblast">Petrovskoye</a>) was a <a href="Soviet%20Union">Soviet</a> <a href="Ukraine">Ukrainian</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> player and coach.
